alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; Southampton; Suffolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 4:52PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Isle of Wight, and east central Southampton Counties and the central City of Suffolk through 515 PM EDT... At 451 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sedley, or 9 miles west of Windsor, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Windsor, Holland, Suffolk, Kings Fork, Carrsville, Collosse, Lummis, Kilby, Walters, Boaz, Burdette and Elwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects.
